text:
Very friendly environment with good karaoke sound system and attentive staff with good service.
A good place for a good time.

The atmosphere was warm and inviting, perfect for catching up with friends or unwinding after a long day. The decor blends a modern vibe with a touch of rustic charm, creating a cozy yet lively ambiance.

Just recently went to this place through friends recommended.
Nice Place to chill and good place for Pool players if u are into Pool games. ðŸ˜ŠWith really great players there.

Situated at the heart of Serangoon Gardens, Bulldog boasts a beautiful 9ft pool table perfectly maintained for avid-pool lovers. They too have a very good karaoke sound system, smoking corner and friendly & attentive staff. My beer glass is never empty ðŸ¤£ so if you want to unwind after a long/short day, shoot some pool or sing some songs, please head down to Bulldog Cafe and Pub to get your fix!
Good place to chill with your friends. Fun vibes. And also great pool scene if you are into the game.
